article: Alexandre Shefer ( Alma-Ata , 28 August 1971 ) is a former Kazakh cyclist . He was a professional racer from 1993 to 2003. Shefer has been a cycling coach from 2007 to 2009 of the Astana team of Alexander Vinokourov , alongside team director Belgian Johan Bruyneel , who had been with the Discovery Channel Team . , 2001 , 2002 ,
